message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is a fair price that still allows me to make a profit while acknowledging your budget. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $11,000. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $10,750. This is the highest price I'm comfortable with.
